title: Game-Based Programming Learning Design: Social Domain Application for Intermediate Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Flexible personalized learning environment enabling individual BYOD access to game platforms

learning_goals: Learners enhance their intermediate-level algorithm design skills using conditional statements/loops by solving in-game missions.
Learners perform logical error debugging procedures with 80% accuracy by analyzing the game feedback system.
Learners provide three or more examples of applying programming games to social problem-solving simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
